title: Supplier registration
topBannerText: Reach hundreds of thousands of customers with your tours and activities
bottomBannerContent: We are your strong partner in tourism marketing. Increase your turnover with us and raise your profile for a successful season.

benefitCard1.title: Expand your market
benefitCard1.content: Increase awareness of your travel products. We promote and distribute them through our partner network.

benefitCard2.title: Create your products in multiple languages
benefitCard2.content: Our content experts will optimize your products for the global market in multiple languages.

benefitCard3.title: Get your payout directly
benefitCard3.content: You will pay commission only on successful bookings.

stepCard1.title: Tell us about your company
stepCard1.content: We will make your company more competitive and successful

stepCard2.title: We review your application
stepCard2.content: We look at your company, your business offers, your business registration and your insurance.

stepCard3.title: Start adding your activities and tours
stepCard3.content: After approval, you can submit your products for review and optimization.

userTypeQuestion: Are you a private or a company host?
userTypeStatement: You will need to provide more information if you are a company host
